General.Name: Banque Saudi Fransi
General.Description: Banque Saudi Fransi provides banking and financial services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. It operates through Retail Banking, Corporate Banking, Treasury, and Investment Banking and Brokerage segments. The company offers deposit products, such as saving, current, and term deposit accounts, as well as mada Pay and Apple Pay products. It also provides home and personal finance, and auto lease; and insurance products, such as education, retirement, travel, and car protection insurance, as well as credit cards; and working capital, contract, structured, and trade finance and sales solutions for micro, small, and medium enterprises and corporates. In addition, the company offers cash management solutions, which include payroll, escrow account, fund collection, point of sale, business to business, dividend management, and payroll and prepaid card service; and securities market solutions, including foreign exchange, commodities, equities, interest rate derivatives, hybrids derivatives, and other trading operations. Further, it provides wealth management and Islamic banking products and services. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: King Saud Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11554
